name: Aleix Renom Cisa
introduction: I’m a passionate worker who recently finished his bachelor’s degree majoring in software development, with work experience in front end development using React and TypeScript. My interests center around creating incredible user experiences both digital and inter-personal, and creating services that are robust and last for years both on the provider’s servers and in the user’s minds.

education.degree: Higher vocational education in 3D Animation, Videogames and Interactive Environments
Vocational education in Graphical Arts Prepress

responsibilities: Designing and implementing front-end components in React + TypeScript
Collaboratively designing interactive applications for professional clients
Programming the designed applications in Unity using C#
Proactively selling bus tickets in high volumes, during limited morning hours in a high-stress competitive environment.
Management of customers and queues while providing thorough city attraction information and general customer service.

ownProjects.description: The purpose of this project is to showcase my current software development skills and advance them at the same time. I use Trello for task management, VS Code for coding, and Github for version control.
